title: Our Taffy!
text: Let's always pretend that you love him more than us combined.

title: Young Ladies
text: This memory is as blur as me looking at you without glasses but I am sure it was a magnificent one like every other.

title: Mind readers
text:
Neha- I want to eat... 
 Morvi- choco lava cake 
 Neha- let's order... 
 Morvi- bread sticks 
 I don't know how you did it but that was mind-bending how you knew what was going through my head this day.

title: We Dare you
text: Asking ways from creepy people when the it was almost the middle of night is our speciality but asking for a ride is next level.
